Package edu.berkeley.compbio.phyloutils

Interface Summary
RankedTaxonomyService<T extends Serializable>  
RequiresPreparationTaxonomyService<T>  
TaxonomyService<T extends Serializable> Provides a simplified interface for taxonomy sources (e.g., NCBI, or a Newick file) that doesn't provide all the services of a full RootedTree.
TaxonomySynonymService Map taxonomic names to synonymous taxonomic names.
TaxonStringIdMapper<T>  
 

Class Summary
CiccarelliTaxonomyService Reads a Newick tree file containing the Tree of Life (Ciccarelli 2006, http://itol.embl.de) and provides it as a RootedPhylogeny.
EnvironmentParser Reads an environment file in the UniFrac format (http://bmf2.colorado.edu/unifrac/tutorial.psp), matching the taxon names against nodes in the given tree, and provides the resulting communities as weighted RootedPhylogenies.
ExplicitHybridRootedPhylogeny<T extends Serializable>  
HugenholtzTaxonomyService Provides a view onto the Hugenholtz taxonomy using Integer IDs.
HybridRootedPhylogeny<T extends Serializable> Sometimes we have branch lengths on one phylogeny, but we want to know distances between nodes that are not on that phylogeny.
LogTransitionMatrix A matrix of state-to-state probabilities, in log probability units.
NASTDistanceMapper Estimate the phylogenetic distance on one of Morgan Price's FastTree + GreenGenes trees between a NAST-aligned fragment pair
NearestNodeFinder Load a list of "known" nodes, eg the isolates.
NewickIntegerTaxonomyService  
NewickParser<T extends Serializable> Parser for New Hampshire (aka Newick) tree files.
NewickStringTaxonomyService  
NewickWithSynonymsAndRanksTaxonomyService  
PhylogenyTypeConverter  
RootedPhylogenyAsService<T extends Serializable>  
TaxonMerger Groups closely related leaves on a tree into larger taxa.
TaxonomyBasedSynonymService The point of this is to insulate the caller from the internal IDs.
TraditionalTaxonMerger  
TransitionMatrix A matrix of state-to-state probabilities, in probability units.
 

Exception Summary
PhyloUtilsException This exception is thrown when something goes wrong in the phyloutils package.
PhyloUtilsRuntimeException This exception is thrown when something goes wrong in the phyloutils package.
